outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to integrate Belarus' obligations under UNCCD into its national development and sectoral planning frameworks and align its NAP in a manner that is in line with UNCCD 10-Year Strategy and UNCCD reporting and review process. 
The project has two components. Component 1 aims at supporting Belarus to align its NAP with the UNCCD 10-Year Strategy. Component 2 will assist Belarus in preparation of national reports to the UNCCD and strengthen country's capacity for implementation of indicator-based monitoring and assessment for the UNCCD reporting.

project_descr: Support to National Action Plan Alignment and the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification Reporting in the Republic of Belarus
project_title: Support to National Action Plan Alignment
